name: Deep Dive Beta Build
description:
Goal:

Reach the ending submarine and earn a higher score with photos of newly discovered fish. (For now the "submarine" is a cube)

Pick Ups:

Oxygen tanks replenish oxygen

First Aid Kits replenish health

Controls:

Cursor - Points you in direction of movement

WASD - Movement

Q/E - Rotate the player

Spacebar - Swim straight up

Left-Ctrl -  Swim straight down

C - Swap camera to photo camera and back to cinematic camera

V - Take photo while in photo camera

F - For flashlight when obtained

R - Restarts game if game ends
